items/other/blacksmithing/shovel_copper/: A copper shovel. Can be charged to dig 3 tiles in a row.
items/other/blacksmithing/shovel_gold/de: A splendid golden shovel. Can be charged to dig a 6x6 area.
items/other/blacksmithing/shovel_iron/de: An iron shovel. Can be charged to dig a 3x3 area.
items/other/blacksmithing/shovel_mistril: A shovel made from mistril. Can be charged to dig a 6x9 area.
items/other/blacksmithing/shovel_silver/: A silver shovel. Can be charged to dig a 3x6 area.
items/other/blacksmithing/shovel_worn/de: A worn but still serviceable shovel. Used to expand fields, excavate dig spots, and destroy crops.
